He holds an Ph.D in human geography from Peking University. Dr. Guo’s research interest is Economic geography, Industrial Geography, Industrial system. His research aims to enhance the understanding of the field of economic geography, especially industrial geography. His research have been published in several prestigious journals in the field of economic geography. Dr. Guo's work also gained international recognition from peers with citations over 200 times to date.Thesis monographpublicationsGrantsAwardsServiceTeachingSelected publicationsGuo J, He C, Ren Z. Evolution of Regional Export Growth in China: A Multidimensional Decomposition of Export Dynamics[J]. The Professional Geographer, 2021: 1-13.BooksIndustrial Geography in Contemporary China, Routledge, He Canfei, 2022.(Chapter 5: geography of Chinese Industries)Outstanding Graduates of Nankai University in 2019Advanced Spatial Economics（For PH.D）  NKU College of Economic and Social Development94 Weijin Road, Nankai District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300071Ph: +86-022-23503746Fax:+86-022-23505067cesd-info@nankai.edu.cnJiahong Guo-College of Economic and Social DevelopmentJiahong Guo-College of Economic and Social Development  HOME About CESDMission and VisionAdministrationVisit CESD Academic ProgramsDoctoral ProgramsMaster’s ProgramsInternational Collaboration Programs Research & FacultyAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty Members Alumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & Services中文 Nankai University in Tianjin of China NKU College of Economic and Social Development 中文About CESDMission and VisionAdministrationVisit CESDAcademic ProgramsDoctoral ProgramsMaster’s ProgramsInternational Collaboration ProgramsResearch & FacultyAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty MembersAlumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & ServicesAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty MembersResearch & FacultyJiahong GuoAssistant Professor, guojiahong@nankai.edu.cnOffice Hours:By AppointmentCV Website:https://nku-esd.nankai.edu.cn/info/1140/1389.htm Ph.D in human geography Peking University Fields：Economic geography, Industrial Geography, Industrial systemDr Jiahong Guo is an Assistant Professor in the College of Economic and Social Development at Nankai University.
